description:
Section 73 application for the variation of Condition 2 (drawings) of Full Planning application Ref: P2014/0483/FUL for 'Demolition of existing garages/stores and construction of three storey residential building comprising 2 x 3 bedroom/6 person maisonettes and 2 x 1 bedroom/2 person flats', dated 04/03/2015.

The amendments include:
- Raising the height of the building by 300mm;
- Change of window surround material from aluminium to concrete; and
- Change of front canopy material from concrete to lightweight Glass Reinforced Concrete.
decision_conditions:
ACCESSIBLE HOMES STANDARDS - (COMPLIANCE):  The residential dwellings, in accordance with the Access Statement and plans hereby approved, shall be constructed to the standards for flexible homes in Islington ('Accessible Housing in Islington' SPD) and incorporating all Lifetime Homes Standards.  

REASON: To secure the provision of flexible, visitable and adaptable homes appropriate to diverse and changing needs.
